OUR BOARD
AMERISAFE’s Board believes that one of its primary 
responsibilities is to promote a corporate culture of 
accountability, responsibility, and ethical conduct. Our 
Board presently consists of eight non-employee directors 
and one employee director. The Board is divided into three 
classes, with each class serving three-year terms. The term of one class expires at each annual meeting of shareholders. 
As part of AMERISAFE’s corporate governance guidelines, 
the Board has established a policy requiring a majority  
of the members of the Board to be independent. Currently, 
other than our CEO, all of AMERISAFE’s directors  
are independent.
